mapper.select: SELECT t.forumId FROM ( SELECT forum.forumId, ROUND(RAND()) AS randomId FROM forum_info AS forum WHERE forum.appId = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND forum.forumIsRecommend = 1 AND forum.forumIsActive = 1 AND forum.forumAuditStatus = 'AUDIT_PASS' AND forum.systemStatus = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT forumId FROM forum_user_follow_info AS forumUserFollow WHERE forumUserFollow.systemStatus = 1 AND forumUserFollow.forumId = forum.forumId AND forumUserFollow.memberId = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) GROUP BY forum.forumId ) AS t ORDER BY t.randomId ASC LIMIT #{n}

SELECT forum.forumId FROM forum_info AS forum WHERE forum.appId = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND forum.forumIsRecommend = 0 AND forum.forumIsActive = 1 AND forum.forumAuditStatus = 'AUDIT_PASS' AND forum.systemStatus = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT forumId FROM forum_user_follow_info AS forumUserFollow WHERE forumUserFollow.systemStatus = 1 AND forumUserFollow.forumId = forum.forumId AND forumUserFollow.memberId = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) GROUP BY forum.forumId ORDER BY forum.systemCreateTime DESC LIMIT #{m}, #{n}
